scenario_text.value: Hm? Ryo, is that you?
Oh, Takuma, it’s you.
I didn’t expect to find you here.

You weren’t waiting for me to come by or
anything, were you?
No way! I mean, why would I do that?
Yeah, right. Okay, well, I’d better be going.

Hold on just a sec, would you?! Why are you
always in such a hurry to leave?!

And anyway...uh... I wanted to ask you
something!
Again?
Come on, don’t be like that. Listen...
I want you to try some of this food I made.
Here, I brought it in this plastic container.

(Uh...what am I supposed to make of this,
exactly?)
(And how do I respond?)
What should I say to Ryo?
Are you in love?
Is it drugged?
Why do this?

Um, is this some sort of confession? Are you
saying you’re in love with me?!
Ugh, no! Not even close!

I mean, I guess I can see why you’d think
that...

(The way Ryo is acting is really
suspicious...)

But remember how I asked for your advice
before?

About how to get along better with Kunemon?
Well, I thought I’d try cooking for him.

(I get it. Still, I’m surprised at Ryo’s
maternal instincts.)
What? Did you drug this or something?
Huh?!

Are you trying to knock me out for some
reason? Don’t tell me—
No! It’s not like that at all!

I mean, I’m flattered you feel that way, but
shouldn’t we at least be friends first?
Wha’?! What is wrong with you? Stop blushing!
Why are you doing this?

Well, remember how I asked you for advice
before? About how to get along with Kunemon?

That’s why I cooked that, but if I asked
someone else to try it, they wouldn’t get it.

(I mean, I didn’t get it either. Still, I’m
surprised.)

(Ryo really seems concerned for Kunemon’s
feelings.)
Well, anyway, let me try it. *munch*
So, how is it?
Hmm...

Well, it’s not bad, but it’s not great
either... I’d say it’s right on the line.
Oh, come on! Make up your mind!
